name: puncher
content:
puncher noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who punches (= hits forcefully with their fists) in a particular kind of way, especially in the sport of boxing: She has quick hands and is an accurate puncher. He was one of the most fearsome punchers I had ever seen in a boxing ring.
More examplesFewer examplesLewis is a hard puncher and a sophisticated boxer.The guy is tough, strong and a good puncher.He was a savage puncher with either hand and was superbly conditioned every time he stepped into the ring.

puncher noun [C]
(DEVICE)
a device for punching holes in a surface or material (= cutting holes in something by pushing a piece of metal into or through it): Each puncher makes a different shaped hole. The cupboard was stuffed full of paper, staplers, hole punchers, paper clips and tape. Compare
hole punch
More examplesFewer examplesSkin samples were taken with a medical biopsy puncher.Voters use a special hole puncher to mark a spot by the name of the person they want to elect.
